name: Elliott Gould
description:
We had no idea that Elliott Gould was once married to Barbra Streisand.

Oh, come on, JONJ, the outcries will come. Aren't you the Internet expert on celebrity Jews? What kind of an expert doesn't know about the marriage of Barbra, the avatar of American Jewish women, and Elliott, who... uh... has a very prolific career starring in various movies and TV shows?

We had no idea that Elliott Gould once starred with George Clooney on E/R.

Oh, come on, JONJ, the outcries will come. Wait? Huh? Elliott Gould was on ER?

No, not ER. "E/R". The slash is important: E/R was a short-lived sitcom in the 1980s, with Gould in the lead, and Clooney in his first major television role.

We had no idea that...

You know, that's enough Elliott Gould trivia for one day. What are we, the Internet expert on celebrity Jews?

Oh.
